text:
August 10, 1956
Mr* Graydon Ausmus
Box 2002 - Radio Station WUQA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon;
Before I leave, after ny one day*s stay in the office, I want
you to know again how much I enjoyed, as I am sure Ralph did,
the evening and the night we spent with you at the cabin.
Also please give your wife our best for the hours spent at
your homo among your beautiful flowers.
Since this was the first opportunity I had had to talk with
you without interruption for several months, I feel that I am
back in touch with you again. Our very best as always.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
HJS/mfb
